signUpSubheading: Fill the form below to create an account.
doNotHaveAccountYet: Do not have an account yet?
signUpToAcceptInvite: Please sign in/up to accept the invite
clickToAcceptAs: Click the button below to accept the invite with as {{email}}
acceptInviteWithDifferentAccount: Want to accept the invite with a different account?
alreadyHaveAccountStatement: I already have an account, I want to sign in instead
doNotHaveAccountStatement: I do not have an account, I want to sign up instead
passwordLengthError: Please provide a password with at least 6 characters
sendLinkSuccessDescription: Check your email, we just sent you a link. Follow the link to sign in.
sendLinkSuccess: We sent you a link by email
verificationCodeHint: Enter the code of your authenticator app
sendMfaCodeError: Sorry, we couldn't send you a verification code
verifyMfaCodeError: Ops! It looks like the code is not correct
reauthenticateDescription: For security reasons, we need you to re-authenticate
errorAlertHeading: Sorry, we could not authenticate you
emailConfirmationAlertHeading: We sent you a confirmation email.
emailConfirmationAlertBody: Welcome! Please check your email and click the link to verify your account.
resendLinkSuccessDescription: We sent you a new link to your email! Follow the link to sign in.
authenticationErrorAlertBody: Sorry, we could not authenticate you. Please try again.
resetPasswordError: Sorry, we could not reset your password. Please try again.
inviteAlertHeading: You have been invited to join a team
inviteAlertDescription: Please sign in or sign up to accept the invite and join the team.
mfaErrorLoadingFactorsDescription: Sorry, we couldn't load the factors list. Please try again.
mfaChooseFactorHeading: Choose a factor to verify your identity
multiFactorSetupSuccess: Multi-factor authentication has been successfully set up
setupMfaDescription: Set up Multi-Factor Authentication method to further secure your account
enterVerificationCode: Enter the verification code generated by your authenticator app
qrCodeErrorDescription: Sorry, we weren't able to generate the QR code
qrCodeInstructions: Use your authenticator app to scan the QR code below. Then enter the code generated.
factorNameLabel: A memorable name to identify this factor
factorNameDescription: Use an easy-to-remember name to easily identify this factor in the future. Ex. iPhone 14
setupFailedDescription: Sorry, there was an error while setting up your factor. Please try again.
mfaSecureAccountTitle: Secure your account with Multi-Factor Authentication
mfaSecureAccountDescription: Set up Multi-Factor Authentication method to further secure your account
unenrollFactorDescription: You're about to unenroll this factor. You will not be able to use it to login to your account.
resetPasswordDescription: Enter your email address below. You will receive a link to reset your password.
signInDescription: Welcome back! Please sign in to your account.
signUpDescription: Join us today! Create your account to get started.
authenticationErrorDescription: Sorry, we could not authenticate you. Please try again.
bySigningUp: By signing up, you agree to our
passwordResetSuccess: Check your Inbox! We emailed you a link for resetting your Password.
passwordResetToast: Password reset link sent to your email
updatePasswordSuccessDescription: Your password has been successfully updated!
reauthenticationRequired: Password update requires reauthentication. Please log out and log back in.
noEmailError: Cannot update password: No email associated with account
resendLinkSuccessDescription: We sent you a new link to your email! Follow the link to sign in.
acceptTerms: I accept the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
activeSessionsDescription: Manage your active sessions across all devices. You currently have {{count}} active session{{plural}}.
revokeAllOthersDescription: This will sign you out of all other devices. You will need to sign in again on those devices.
revokeSessionDescription: This will sign out this session from the other device.
locationInfo: Sessions show location information based on IP addresses. Location data is fetched from a free geolocation service.
updatePasswordCardDescription: Update your password here. Make sure it's strong and secure.
loginProvidersDescription: Manage your connected login providers and authentication methods.
dangerZoneDescription: Deleting your account is irreversible. All your data will be permanently removed from our servers and cannot be recovered.
deleteAccountConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers.
deleteAccountWarning: You will lose all data associated with your account including your settings and profile information.
deleteAccountError: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
signUpFooter: By signing up, you agree to our <0>Terms of Service</0> and <1>Privacy Policy</1>. Need help? <2>Get in touch</2>.
googleSignInDisabledDescription: Google Sign In doesn't work with Expo Go as it requires native code to work.

errors.minPasswordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.minPasswordNumbers: Password must contain at least one number
errors.minPasswordSpecialChars: Password must contain at least one special character
errors.uppercasePassword: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
errors.User already registered: This credential is already in use. Please try with another one.
errors.Email not confirmed: Please confirm your email address before signing in
errors.generic: Sorry, we weren't able to authenticate you. Please try again.
errors.link: Sorry, we encountered an error while sending your link. Please try again.

supabase.unexpected_failure: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
supabase.validation_failed: Validation failed. Please check your input and try again.

supabase.phone_exists: An account with this phone number already exists.

supabase.captcha_failed: Captcha verification failed. Please try again.
supabase.manual_linking_disabled: Manual account linking is currently disabled.
supabase.sms_send_failed: Failed to send SMS. Please try again.

supabase.phone_not_confirmed: Please confirm your phone number before signing in.
supabase.saml_assertion_no_user_id: SAML assertion does not contain a user ID.
supabase.saml_assertion_no_email: SAML assertion does not contain an email address.

supabase.user_sso_managed: This user account is managed by SSO.
supabase.same_password: New password must be different from the current password.
supabase.otp_expired: The email link has expired. Please try again.

supabase.over_sms_send_rate_limit: Too many SMS requests. Please wait and try again.

supabase.hook_payload_over_size_limit: Authentication hook payload is too large.
supabase.hook_payload_invalid_content_type: Authentication hook payload has invalid content type.

supabase.mfa_phone_verify_not_enabled: Phone MFA verification is not enabled.

supabase.codeVerifierMismatch: It looks like you're trying to sign in using a different browser than the one you used to request the sign in link. Please try again using the same browser.
